languages.text: "Естественно, нет никакой панацеи — ни тайных химикатов Инквизиции, ни {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}археотеха{/g}. Только эта проклятая друкарская штуковина. На что я вообще рассчитывала? Но бешеной шавке положено быть в наморднике, иначе ее усыпят. А мне бы не хотелось, чтобы меня усыпили. Правда, как он кончить — тоже не хотелось бы... Вы как считаете, Лорд-капитан?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Псайкер горько усмехается.{/n} "Естественно, нет никакой чудесной панацеи — ни тайных химикатов инквизиции, ни археотеха. Только эта проклятая друкарская штуковина. На что я вообще рассчитывала? Но бешеной шавке положено быть в наморднике, иначе ее усыпят. А мне бы не хотелось, чтобы меня усыпили. Правда как он кончить тоже не хотелось бы... Вы как считаете, Лорд-капитан? Что мне дальше-то делать?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lo and behold, there was no cure-all miracle — no secret chemicals of the Inquisition, no {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}. Just this damn Drukhari gizmo. What did I even expect to find? But, well, a mad dog has to be kept muzzled or else somebody will put it down. And I don't want to be put down. Then again, I don't want to wind up like him either... What do you think, Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: "Естественно, нет никакой панацеи — ни тайных химикатов Инквизиции, ни {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}археотеха{/g}. Только эта проклятая друкарская штуковина. На что я вообще рассчитывала? Но бешеной шавке положено быть в наморднике, иначе ее усыпят. А мне бы не хотелось, чтобы меня усыпили. Правда, как он кончить — тоже не хотелось бы... Вы как считаете, Лорд-капитан?"

What did I even expect to find? But, well, a mad dog has to be kept muzzled or else somebody will put it down. And I don't want to be put down. Then again, I don't want to wind up like him either... What do you think, Lord Captain?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lo and behold, there was no cure-all miracle — no secret chemicals of the Inquisition, no {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}. Just this damn Drukhari gizmo. What did I even expect to find? But, well, a mad dog has to be kept muzzled or else somebody will put it down. And I don't want to be put down. Then again, I don't want to wind up like him either... What do you think, Lord Captain?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “好吧，没有什么包治百病的灵药，没有什么审判庭的秘密药剂，也没有什么{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}远古科技{/g}，只有这个该死的小玩意儿。我当初到底在指望些什么呢？不过，话说回来，疯狗必须戴上口套，否则就会被人打死。我可不想别人打死，但话说回来，我也不想变成他这个样子……你是怎么想的，舰长大人？”
languages.original_text: "Lo and behold, there was no cure-all miracle — no secret chemicals of the Inquisition, no {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}. Just this damn Drukhari gizmo. What did I even expect to find? But, well, a mad dog has to be kept muzzled or else somebody will put it down. And I don't want to be put down. Then again, I don't want to wind up like him either... What do you think, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: “好吧，没有什么包治百病的灵药，没有什么审判庭的秘密药剂，也没有什么{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}远古科技{/g}，只有这个该死的小玩意儿。我当初到底在指望些什么呢？不过，话说回来，疯狗必须戴上口套，否则就会被人打死。我可不想别人打死，但话说回来，我也不想变成他这个样子……你是怎么想的，舰长大人？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Para sorpresa de nadie, no había ninguna cura milagrosa, químicos secretos de la Inquisición ni {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arqueotecnología{/g}. Solo este maldito trasto Drukhari. ¿Qué esperaba encontrar? Pero, en fin, los perros de presa necesitan un bozal para que no los sacrifiquen. Y no quiero acabar así. Aunque la verdad es que tampoco quiero vivir como él... ¿Qué opina, Lord Capitán?».
languages.original_text: "Lo and behold, there was no cure-all miracle — no secret chemicals of the Inquisition, no {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}. Just this damn Drukhari gizmo. What did I even expect to find? But, well, a mad dog has to be kept muzzled or else somebody will put it down. And I don't want to be put down. Then again, I don't want to wind up like him either... What do you think, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: «Para sorpresa de nadie, no había ninguna cura milagrosa, químicos secretos de la Inquisición ni {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arqueotecnología{/g}. Solo este maldito trasto Drukhari. ¿Qué esperaba encontrar? Pero, en fin, los perros de presa necesitan un bozal para que no los sacrifiquen. Y no quiero acabar así. Aunque la verdad es que tampoco quiero vivir como él... ¿Qué opina, Lord Capitán?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Und siehe da, es gab kein Allheilmittel. Keine geheimen Chemikalien der Inquisition, keine {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}Archäotech{/g}. Nur dieses verfluchte Drukhari-Ding. Was hatte ich erwartet? Aber nun, ein wahnsinniger Hund muss einen Maulkorb tragen, sonst wird er eingeschläfert. Und ich will nicht eingeschläfert werden. Andererseits will ich auch nicht wie er enden ... Was meint Ihr, Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: "Lo and behold, there was no cure-all miracle — no secret chemicals of the Inquisition, no {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}. Just this damn Drukhari gizmo. What did I even expect to find? But, well, a mad dog has to be kept muzzled or else somebody will put it down. And I don't want to be put down. Then again, I don't want to wind up like him either... What do you think, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: "Und siehe da, es gab kein Allheilmittel. Keine geheimen Chemikalien der Inquisition, keine {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}Archäotech{/g}. Nur dieses verfluchte Drukhari-Ding. Was hatte ich erwartet? Aber nun, ein wahnsinniger Hund muss einen Maulkorb tragen, sonst wird er eingeschläfert. Und ich will nicht eingeschläfert werden. Andererseits will ich auch nicht wie er enden ... Was meint Ihr, Lord Captain?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「驚いたことに、奇跡の万能薬なんてなかったの。異端審問庁の秘密の化学薬品も、{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}技術遺産{/g}にもね。あったのは、このデュカーリの装置だけ。とんだ骨折り損よ。でもまあ、狂犬には口輪を付けておかないと誰かに処分されてしまうからさ。あたいは処分されたくない。それにやっぱり、あいつのようになりたくもないし…ロード・キャプテン、あんたはどう思う？」
languages.original_text: "Lo and behold, there was no cure-all miracle — no secret chemicals of the Inquisition, no {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}. Just this damn Drukhari gizmo. What did I even expect to find? But, well, a mad dog has to be kept muzzled or else somebody will put it down. And I don't want to be put down. Then again, I don't want to wind up like him either... What do you think, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: 「驚いたことに、奇跡の万能薬なんてなかったの。異端審問庁の秘密の化学薬品も、{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}技術遺産{/g}にもね。あったのは、このデュカーリの装置だけ。とんだ骨折り損よ。でもまあ、狂犬には口輪を付けておかないと誰かに処分されてしまうからさ。あたいは処分されたくない。それにやっぱり、あいつのようになりたくもないし…ロード・キャプテン、あんたはどう思う？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Quelle surprise ! Le remède miracle n'existe pas... Pas d'élixir secret de l'Inquisition, pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archéotechnologie{/g}. Juste ce foutu bidule drukhari. Que pouvais-je espérer d'autre, après tout ? Un chien enragé doit avoir une muselière ou quelqu'un finira par le faire piquer. Et je ne veux pas être euthanasiée. Mais je ne veux pas non plus finir comme lui... Qu'en pensez-vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »
languages.original_text: "Lo and behold, there was no cure-all miracle — no secret chemicals of the Inquisition, no {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}. Just this damn Drukhari gizmo. What did I even expect to find? But, well, a mad dog has to be kept muzzled or else somebody will put it down. And I don't want to be put down. Then again, I don't want to wind up like him either... What do you think, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: « Quelle surprise ! Le remède miracle n'existe pas... Pas d'élixir secret de l'Inquisition, pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archéotechnologie{/g}. Juste ce foutu bidule drukhari. Que pouvais-je espérer d'autre, après tout ? Un chien enragé doit avoir une muselière ou quelqu'un finira par le faire piquer. Et je ne veux pas être euthanasiée. Mais je ne veux pas non plus finir comme lui... Qu'en pensez-vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Bak sen şu işe. Her şeyi iyileştiren bir mucize yokmuş. Engizisyon'un gizli kimyasalları yokmuş, {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arkeotek{/g} yokmuş. Bir tek bu kahrolasıca Drukhari zımbırtısı var. Ne bulmayı bekliyordum ki? Delirmiş bir köpeğin tasmasını çıkarırsak birileri onu öldürebilir. Ben öldürülmek istemiyorum. Fakat sonum onun gibi olsun da istemiyorum... Ne düşünüyorsun Lord Kaptan?"
languages.original_text: "Lo and behold, there was no cure-all miracle — no secret chemicals of the Inquisition, no {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}. Just this damn Drukhari gizmo. What did I even expect to find? But, well, a mad dog has to be kept muzzled or else somebody will put it down. And I don't want to be put down. Then again, I don't want to wind up like him either... What do you think, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: "Bak sen şu işe. Her şeyi iyileştiren bir mucize yokmuş. Engizisyon'un gizli kimyasalları yokmuş, {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arkeotek{/g} yokmuş. Sadece bu kahrolasıca Drukhari gizmo varmış. Ne bulmayı bekliyordum ki? Delirmiş bir köpeğin tasmasını çıkarmamak lazım yoksa birileri onu öldürebilir. Ben öldürülmek istemiyorum. Fakat sonum onun gibi olsun da istemiyorum... Ne düşünüyorsun Lord Kaptan?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
